about: I'm a Computer Science student at Washington University in St. Louis pursuing both B.S. and M.S. degrees, with a passion for building scalable systems and data-driven products. I specialize in full-stack development, product analytics, and AI/ML applications. I've built analytics pipelines handling 10,000+ events, won first prize for my AI-powered memory coach app (RemindMe), and was a semi-finalist at the Skandalaris Venture Competition with TravelAI. I enjoy solving complex problems and shipping features that create measurable impact. Currently seeking full-time opportunities in product engineering, backend systems, or ML infrastructure.
career_goals: Looking for roles in product engineering, full-stack development, analytics infrastructure, or ML tooling where I can build systems that help teams make data-driven decisions and ship better products.
